ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was supported by the Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development of the Republic of Serbia, contract number 451-03-68/2020-14/200007. The authors are grateful to Milan Dragićevićfor Figure 5 generated in ragp. The authors also thank Milica Simonović for rendering and post-production of the somatic embryogenesis time-laps video (Supplement).
